statements.statement: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORT ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `RESELLERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTE_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERTYPE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `OFFERORS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`SID`) )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORTHISTORY ( `SID` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL , `AXTMODIFY` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTTITLE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `REPORTNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `RESELLERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTATIONNO_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUOTE_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPACT_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SHIP_DATE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `EMAIL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PHONE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `FAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERNAME_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ORDERTYPE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `DELIVERYADDRESS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `OFFERORS_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ITEM1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `PRODUCT_NAME1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SPECIFICATION1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `QUANTITY1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARVALUE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALVALUEYEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_YEAR_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `NOTE_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `HEAD_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `SALES_MANAGER_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ATTN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `MODIFYUSER` VARCHAR(200) NULL , `ACTION` VARCHAR(200) NULL, `UPDATETIME` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORTHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , RESELLERNAME_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , QUOTE_DATE_V , COMPACT_V , SHIP_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V , PHONE_V , COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V , FAX_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , ADDRESS_V , ORDERTYPE_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , OFFERORS_V , ITEM1_V , PRODUCT_NAME1_V , SPECIFICATION1_V , QUANTITY1_V , ONEYEARVALUE1_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , THREEYEARVALUE1_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V , NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V , ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , TOTALVALUEYEAR_V , TOTAL_YEAR_V , TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V , TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , SALES_MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'UPDATE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORT WHERE SID = #SID#

INSERT RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORTHISTORY SELECT SID , AXTMODIFY , REPORTTITLE_V , REPORTNAME_V , RESELLERNAME_V , QUOTATIONNO_V , UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V , QUOTE_DATE_V , COMPACT_V , SHIP_DATE_V , EMAIL_V , PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V , PHONE_V , COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V , FAX_V , CUSTOMERNAME_V , ADDRESS_V , ORDERTYPE_V , DELIVERYADDRESS_V , OFFERORS_V , ITEM1_V , PRODUCT_NAME1_V , SPECIFICATION1_V , QUANTITY1_V , ONEYEARVALUE1_V , ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , THREEYEARVALUE1_V , THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V , NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V , NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V , NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V , ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V , THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V , TOTALVALUEYEAR_V , TOTAL_YEAR_V , TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V , TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V , NOTE_V , HEAD_V , SALES_MANAGER_V , ATTN_V , CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V, '$USERID$', 'DELETE', NOW() FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORT WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1_REPORT(SID, AXTMODIFY, REPORTTITLE_V, REPORTNAME_V, RESELLERNAME_V, QUOTATIONNO_V, UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V, QUOTE_DATE_V, COMPACT_V, SHIP_DATE_V, EMAIL_V, PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V, PHONE_V, COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V, FAX_V, CUSTOMERNAME_V, ADDRESS_V, ORDERTYPE_V, DELIVERYADDRESS_V, OFFERORS_V, ITEM1_V, PRODUCT_NAME1_V, SPECIFICATION1_V, QUANTITY1_V, ONEYEARVALUE1_V, ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V, THREEYEARVALUE1_V, THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V, NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V, NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V, NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V, NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V, ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V, ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V, THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V, THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V, TOTALVALUEYEAR_V, TOTAL_YEAR_V, TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V, TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V, NOTE_V, HEAD_V, SALES_MANAGER_V, ATTN_V, CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V) VALUES(#SID#, #AXTMODIFY#, #REPORTTITLE_V#, #REPORTNAME_V#, #RESELLERNAME_V#, #QUOTATIONNO_V#, #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#, #QUOTE_DATE_V#, #COMPACT_V#, #SHIP_DATE_V#, #EMAIL_V#, #PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V#, #PHONE_V#, #COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V#, #FAX_V#, #CUSTOMERNAME_V#, #ADDRESS_V#, #ORDERTYPE_V#, #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#, #OFFERORS_V#, #ITEM1_V#, #PRODUCT_NAME1_V#, #SPECIFICATION1_V#, #QUANTITY1_V#, #ONEYEARVALUE1_V#, #ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#, #THREEYEARVALUE1_V#, #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#, #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V#, #NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V#, #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V#, #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V#, #ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#, #ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#, #THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#, #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#, #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#, #TOTAL_YEAR_V#, #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#, #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#, #NOTE_V#, #HEAD_V#, #SALES_MANAGER_V#, #ATTN_V#, #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#)
statements.statement:
SELECT AXTMODIFY ,REPORTTITLE_V ,REPORTNAME_V ,RESELLERNAME_V ,QUOTATIONNO_V ,UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V ,QUOTE_DATE_V ,COMPACT_V ,SHIP_DATE_V ,EMAIL_V ,PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V ,PHONE_V ,COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V ,FAX_V ,CUSTOMERNAME_V ,ADDRESS_V ,ORDERTYPE_V ,DELIVERYADDRESS_V ,OFFERORS_V ,ITEM1_V ,PRODUCT_NAME1_V ,SPECIFICATION1_V ,QUANTITY1_V ,ONEYEARVALUE1_V ,ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V ,THREEYEARVALUE1_V ,THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V ,NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V ,NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V ,NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V ,NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V ,ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V ,ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V ,THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V ,THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V ,TOTALVALUEYEAR_V ,TOTAL_YEAR_V ,TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V ,TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V ,NOTE_V ,HEAD_V ,SALES_MANAGER_V ,ATTN_V FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
RESELLERNAME_V like #RESELLERNAME_V#
QUOTATIONNO_V like #QUOTATIONNO_V#
UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V like #UNIFIEDNUMBERING_V#
QUOTE_DATE_V like #QUOTE_DATE_V#
COMPACT_V like #COMPACT_V#
SHIP_DATE_V like #SHIP_DATE_V#
EMAIL_V like #EMAIL_V#
PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V like #PAYMENT_CONDITIONS_V#
PHONE_V like #PHONE_V#
COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V like #COMPETITIVEBRANDS_V#
FAX_V like #FAX_V#
CUSTOMERNAME_V like #CUSTOMERNAME_V#
ADDRESS_V like #ADDRESS_V#
ORDERTYPE_V like #ORDERTYPE_V#
DELIVERYADDRESS_V like #DELIVERYADDRESS_V#
OFFERORS_V like #OFFERORS_V#
ITEM1_V like #ITEM1_V#
PRODUCT_NAME1_V like #PRODUCT_NAME1_V#
SPECIFICATION1_V like #SPECIFICATION1_V#
QUANTITY1_V like #QUANTITY1_V#
ONEYEARVALUE1_V like #ONEYEARVALUE1_V#
ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V like #ONE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#
THREEYEARVALUE1_V like #THREEYEARVALUE1_V#
THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V like #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#
NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V like #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V#
NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V like #NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V#
NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V like #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V#
NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V like #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V#
ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V like #ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#
ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V like #THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#
THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
TOTALVALUEYEAR_V like #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#
TOTAL_YEAR_V like #TOTAL_YEAR_V#
TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V like #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#
TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V like #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#
NOTE_V like #NOTE_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
SALES_MANAGER_V like #SALES_MANAGER_V#
ATTN_V like #ATTN_V#
CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V like #CUSTOMERS_SIGN_V#
order by SHIP_DATE_V desc LIMIT #START_V#, #LIMIT_V#
statements.select:
SELECT * FROM RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMEMAIL_SETTINGS
SENDERNAME_V like #SENDERNAME_V#
SENDEREMAIL_V like #SENDEREMAIL_V#
statements.update: UPDATE RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMSTATUS_ALERT SET WORK_EVENT_V = #WORK_EVENT_V#, STATUS_V = #STATUS_V# WHERE SID = #SID#
statements.statement:
Select COUNT(*) AS NUM From RESELLERQUOTATIONSYSTEMRESELLER_QUOTATION1
REPORTTITLE_V like #REPORTTITLE_V#
REPORTNAME_V like #REPORTNAME_V#
RESELLERNAME_V like #RESELLERNAME_V#

THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V like #THREE_YEAR_PRICE1_V#
NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V like #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUEYEAR_V#
NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V like #NO_AMOUNT_TAX_YEAR_V#
NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V like #NOAMOUNTTAXVALUETRIENNIAL_V#
NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V like #NO_TAX_AMOUNT_TRIENNIAL_V#
ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V like #ONEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#
ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #ONE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V like #THREEYEARSALESTAXVALUE_V#
THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V like #THREE_YEAR_SALES_TAX_V#
TOTALVALUEYEAR_V like #TOTALVALUEYEAR_V#
TOTAL_YEAR_V like #TOTAL_YEAR_V#
TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V like #TOTALTHREEYEARVALUEPERIOD_V#
TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V like #TOTAL_THREE_YEAR_PERIOD_V#
NOTE_V like #NOTE_V#
HEAD_V like #HEAD_V#
